data.Name: Goldwind Innovation Capital
data.Tagline: Goldwind Innovation Capital is dedicated to engaging with promising companies that can enable a sustainable future.
data.About:
Goldwind Innovation Capital is the corporate venture arm of Goldwind Corp. 

Goldwind Corp is a world-leading wind turbine technology and energy solutions provider. Through the implementation and investment in industry-leading turbine technology, water treatment solutions, and other green energy technological ventures, Goldwind has been hailed as one of Chinaâ€™s most innovative companies. The company now operates on 6 continents, has more than 8,000 employees, and more than 50GW of installed wind capacity. Goldwind is committed with social and environmental responsibility, and create a sustainable tomorrow for future generations.
